DOC.brief_summary: Technological advance make computer aid orthodontic treatment plan possible . 3D dental scanner software make possible design approve outcome treatment begin . Manufacturers provide different customized appliance system would help practitioner achieve computer-designed outcome . The purpose study determine accuracy computer-guided indirect bonding orthodontic bracket achieve predict alignment compare accuracy conventional orthodontic bracket placement achieve predetermined goal . The result study help orthodontist patient know advantage use custom appliance . The study prospective clinical study include total 60 arch 30 patient enrolled Harvard School Dental Medicine . 15 patient assign two study group ( Motion View control ) . Both group 3D intra-oral scan measure initial discrepancy determine computer-simulated design orthodontist believe optimize outcome . At end patient 's participation , 3D intraoral scan take used assess intra-arch leveling alignment use ABO 's objective grading system 's criterion alignment , marginal ridge buccolingual inclination . Each arch superimpose predict outcome determine accurate system achieve plan movement 3 dimension . We hypothesize accuracy computer-guided indirect bonding ( Motion View ) achieve predict outcome differ comparison accuracy conventional orthodontic bracket placement achieve predetermined goal .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Alignment Achieved Using Computer-guided Indirect Bonding Orthodontic Brackets Conventional Appliance Placement
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject seek orthodontic care All permanent teeth must erupt , exclude second third molar Class I , II , III case No 7 mm crowd No 45 degree rotation Presence systemic disease Craniofacial anomaly , include cleft lip palate Syndromes affect bone teeth Congenitally miss teeth , exclude third molar Presence bridge implant Periodontal disease Use drug affect tooth movement bone metabolism ( NSAIDS , bisphosphonates , PTH , corticosteroid ) Pregnancy
